## gocan delete-app

Delete an application

```
gocan delete-app <app-name> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
gocan delete-app myapp -s myscene
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for delete-app
  -s, --scene string   Scene name
      --verbose        display the log information
```
